name: The last letter of the line
instruction:
Create a variable named `str` and assign it the value of an arbitrary non-empty string.
Create a variable named `lastSymbol` and assign it the value of the last character of the string.

Here is an example that is fundamentally similar to what you need to do,
but adapt it to the requirements of the task:
```javascript
const name = 'Jonh';
const last = name[name.length - 1];
```
